# Candido Sales - Software Engineer

> A multidisciplinary engineer focusing on digital experiences

## Site Information

- **URL**: https://www.candidosales.me/
- **Owner**: Candido Sales
- **Type**: Personal Portfolio & Blog
- **Focus**: Software Engineering, Open Source, Volunteer Projects

## About

Candido Sales is a software engineer who creates open source projects and provides consulting services. He is the founder of Geleia Total and Turismo Piauí. He mentors individuals in IT careers through ADPList.

## Main Sections

### Portfolio
https://www.candidosales.me/

Open source projects created and maintained:

- **Cisco ChatGPT Security Advisories**: AI chatbot using Security Advisories data for natural language interaction
- **Svelte Shopify Polaris Icons**: Set of Shopify Polaris Icons for Svelte projects
- **Material Time Picker**: Time picker component using Angular Material
- **Svelte Google Translate**: Google Translate component for Svelte
- **Format Code**: Figma plugin for code formatting and syntax highlighting
- **Landing Page Book 2v**: Landing page for advertising and sales of books to independent authors
- **API in GO to create Cloud Function**: API for deploying Google Cloud Functions in Go
- **Figma plugin boilerplate**: Boilerplate for creating Figma plugins with Svelte, Vite and TypeScript
- **Dependencies report**: Tool to analyze consistency of dependencies in frontend projects
- **Personal Portfolio 2v**: Landing page for personal portfolio
- **Personal Portfolio 1v**: Landing page for personal portfolio

### Volunteer
https://www.candidosales.me/

Projects aligned with beliefs in education, culture, art, public health, and sustainability:

- **Megui**: Mental health guide for individuals and families
- **Tourism Piauí**: Platform to preserve and discover Cuisine, History, and Ecotourism in Piauí, Brazil
- **Geleia Total**: Platform to promote the culture and art of the state of Piauí, Brazil
- **Legal Abortion Map**: Information about legal abortion in Brazil - situations allowed and requirements
- **CELPIP Speaking Countdown**: Training tool for CELPIP speaking test
- **Companies using Angular in Brazil**: Repository of Brazilian companies using Angular in their projects

### Extras
https://www.candidosales.me/

Various projects exploring new resources and technologies:

- **SUS Medical Prescription**: Tool to help doctors from Brazilian public health system make medical prescriptions
- **Social template**: Tool to generate images for Instagram and Facebook from links
- **My Cultural Agenda**: PWA website to help organize agendas at large events

### About
https://www.candidosales.me/about

Background information about Candido Sales, his work, and his consulting services.

### Blog
https://www.candidosales.me/blog

Blog posts about software engineering and technology.

## Technologies

- Svelte
- Angular
- TypeScript
- Go
- Google Cloud Functions
- Figma Plugins
- PWA (Progressive Web Apps)
- AI/ChatGPT

## Special Note

Candido Sales has a strong focus on:
- Open source development
- Social impact projects (health, culture, education)
- Brazilian technology and culture
- Mentoring and helping others in IT careers
